name: Whomst
description:
Whomst is a really epic Rouge-like, action packed game, developed solo by Redline, a.k.a. Nitro-Gen Studios.

It features 4 maps, 4 main bosses, a full bossrush with 4 more bosses and the last epic showdown and 9 unique enemies.

Download from Google Drive (for faster downloads):

 https://drive.google.com/file/d/1cZEU-iiuIwbNlQAM3SGjAh0FIHjbwNoO/view?usp=shari...

Official trailer:

How the game was made: (Devlog video)


The four maps are:

The overworld, where you fight void enemies to buy items for future fights.

Inside the volcano, where you fight an awoken statue which has way more power then you think

Muffinland, the land of King Muffin

Edge between worlds, t̷̥̗̫͌̃͛̋̐̊̈́͝h̵́̎͋͒ͅȇ̵̢̌̅̉ ̶̧̟͈̼̐̇̈́ė̸̛͉̯̲͈̭͚̥̯̯̻̉̐̍̅ṅ̷̨͓̺̪͍̒̉̽́̓̾͝͝d̵̨̧͇̣͍̟̖̻̜̹̚

(Credits are in the game folder)
